Description of incident: An ACLU lawsuit claims that police acted inappropriately during a raid of A Woman's Place clinic.  The lawsuit claims that police not only confiscated around 400 medical records, but read them and revealed sensitive medical information about patients to outside parties.UPDATE (12/28/2012): ACLU is asking that the records be returned.  The police were investigating the clinic because it's owner is accused of billing state Medicaid program for services to 37 patients after having her license suspended.  Seven pharmacies billed Medicaid for prescriptions she had written after the owner's prescription authority was also suspended.
